DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to investigate efficacy, safety and tolerability of ONO-8539 in patients with overactive bladder.
DOC.brief_title: Study of ONO-8539 in Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Patients with medical history of Overactive Bladder symptoms for > 6 months Patients who have a history or presence of other significant diseases, which in the opinion of the investigator, might compromise the patient's safety or the evaluation of the study results
